description: Node.js League of Legends v3 API wrapper with built-in rate-limiting (enforced per region, burst/spread, follows retry headers, app/method rate-limiting), caching (in-memory, Redis), automatic retries, and parameter checking.
name: kindred-api

scripts.build: node make build && node make minify
scripts.go: yarn lint && yarn build && yarn minify && babel test.js -o test-compiled.js && node test-compiled.js
scripts.test-only: cd src && flow --show-all-errors && cd - && node_modules/.bin/babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register "test/**/*.js"
